metadata.note: Hotel details compiled from user-provided bookings. API research unavailable (GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY and AMAP_MAPS_API_KEY not configured). Addresses and amenities based on standard hotel information.

accommodation.name: 重庆来福士洲际酒店 (InterContinental Chongqing Raffles City)
accommodation.address: 重庆市渝中区朝天门来福士广场 (Raffles City, Chaotianmen, Yuzhong District, Chongqing)
accommodation.notes: IMPORTANT: Luggage storage available from morning arrival (4:40am). Cannot check in until evening (after sightseeing). Early morning arrival - request early luggage drop-off. Located in Raffles City complex with shopping and dining options.

accommodation.name: Family Home
accommodation.address: 半山逸城A区35幢1902, 巴中市 (Building 35, Unit 1902, Banshan Yicheng Phase A, Bazhong City)
accommodation.notes: Staying with family for Chinese New Year (跨年). Arrive afternoon via high-speed rail from Chongqing.

accommodation.name: Family Home
accommodation.address: 西锦国际二期四幢四单元1902 (花牌坊北街99号), 成都市 (Building 4, Unit 1902, Xijin International Phase 2, No.99 Huapaifang North Street, Chengdu)
amenities: Close to Taikoo Li shopping district
accommodation.notes: One night stay before flying to Shanghai. Evening arrival from Bazhong. Plan to visit 太古里 in the evening. Depart next morning for panda base visit before afternoon flight.

accommodation.name: 上海外滩SK简奢·逅熙酒店(南京路步行街店)
accommodation.name_en: Shanghai Bund SK Boutique Hotel (Nanjing Road Pedestrian Street Branch)
accommodation.address: 上海市黄浦区南京东路步行街附近 (Near Nanjing Road East Pedestrian Street, Huangpu District, Shanghai)
amenities: Prime location near Bund and Nanjing Road
accommodation.notes: 4-night stay (Feb 18-21). Excellent location for exploring Bund (外滩) and Nanjing Road (南京路). Walking distance to People's Square (人民广场). Evening arrival from Chengdu (17:20 flight arrival). Close to shopping and INFJ-friendly indie bookstores/cafes.

accommodation.name: 上海外滩SK简奢·逅熙酒店(南京路步行街店)
accommodation.name_en: Shanghai Bund SK Boutique Hotel (Nanjing Road Pedestrian Street Branch)
accommodation.address: 上海市黄浦区南京东路步行街附近
accommodation.notes: Same hotel - Day 2 of 4-night stay

accommodation.name: 上海外滩SK简奢·逅熙酒店(南京路步行街店)
accommodation.name_en: Shanghai Bund SK Boutique Hotel (Nanjing Road Pedestrian Street Branch)
accommodation.address: 上海市黄浦区南京东路步行街附近
accommodation.notes: Same hotel - Day 3 of 4-night stay. Full day at Shanghai Disneyland - consider hotel's proximity to Metro Line for easy access to Disney.

accommodation.name: 上海外滩SK简奢·逅熙酒店(南京路步行街店)
accommodation.name_en: Shanghai Bund SK Boutique Hotel (Nanjing Road Pedestrian Street Branch)
accommodation.address: 上海市黄浦区南京东路步行街附近
accommodation.notes: Same hotel - Day 4 of 4-night stay (checkout Feb 22). Michelin dining day - hotel location convenient for 人和馆 and ajiya reservations.

accommodation.name: 桔子酒店(北京中关村学院桥店)
accommodation.name_en: Orange Hotel Beijing Zhongguancun Xueyuanqiao Branch
accommodation.address: 北京市海淀区中关村学院桥附近 (Near Xueyuanqiao, Zhongguancun, Haidian District, Beijing)
accommodation.notes: ONE NIGHT ONLY before moving to rented apartment. Morning arrival from Shanghai (11:25). Afternoon: registration. Evening: 舞剧《只此青绿》performance. Check out Feb 23 morning to move to rented apartment. Strategic location near Tsinghua University area where girlfriend will study.

accommodation.name: Rented Apartment (TBD)
accommodation.notes: MOVING DAY from Orange Hotel. Long-term rental (13 nights) for settling into Beijing life. User will provide exact location later. Preferred area: Near Tsinghua University/Zhongguancun for girlfriend's orientation and comfort zone building. Should accommodate daily living needs (kitchen, laundry) for extended stay.

beijing_apartment_criteria.location_priority: Near Tsinghua University or Zhongguancun area for girlfriend's comfort zone
nice_to_have: Near subway line (easy access to 故宫, 798艺术区)
beijing_apartment_criteria.booking_platform: Consider Airbnb, Xiaozhu (小猪短租), or local rental apps
